mapper.select: SELECT D.STUDENT_NAME, A.TA_APLLYDATE, B.LA_START_DATE, C.LESSON_HOURS, A.TA_CANCLEDATE, C.LESSON_PRICE, B.LA_END_DATE, D.STUDENT_ID, B.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID FROM TAKE_LESSON A,LESSONASSIGNMENT B,LESSON C, STUDENT D WHERE A.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID = B.LESSONASSIGNMENT_ID AND B.LESSON_ID = C.LESSON_ID AND A.STUDENT_ID = D.STUDENT_ID AND A.TA_CANCLEDATE IS NOT NULL
